{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C2300 |revision=v1.x |series=AC2300 |asin=B06XZ3S6B8 |newegg=N82E16833704375 |fcc_date=01/24/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C2300 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4906;BCM4906KFEBG, TK1620, P55W-01 N2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81MA-25TG2Y |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4365E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, TurboQAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 }}
:• '''1625''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., NitroQAM), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., TurboQAM) = '''''2300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2300 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-C2300.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C2300}} Chip IDs are illegible in the FCC photos so the listed chips are a guess :based on the claimed specs and each chip's appearance. Chip IDs supported by this [https://tplink-forum.pl/pub/Specyfikacja%20techniczna/SPEC%20Information%20for%20Wireless%20Router/SPEC-Wireless%20Router-Archer%20C2300%28EU%29%201%200.xls spec document].
